title: Observation object
description: Schema for Sensor things API 1.3 Observation

@iot.selfLink.description: The direct link to the entity

phenomenonTime.description: The time when the observation happened. or Time Interval string (e.g., 2010-12-23T10:20:00.00-07:00 or 2010-12-23T10:20:00.00-07:00/2010-12-23T12:20:00.00-07:00)

result.description: The estimated value of the observed property. Type depends on the observationType defined in the associated Datastream

resultQuality.description: A description of the quality of the result. Type DQ_Element.

resultTime.description: The time the result was generated. TM_Instant (ISO 8601 Time string)

validTime.description: The time period during which the result can be used. TM_Period (ISO 8601 Time Interval string)

Datastream@iot.navigationLink.description: Reference link to the DataStream Definition.
